::KitKat::
She looked at him."Me? I'm the one to do all this? I...I.  OK, 
earlier you said me and Destructor. What' happened to my pack, to 
Drillbit. Tell me, please. I don't mind fulfilling what the matrix 
has in store for me. But what you said earlier disturbes me. What 
happenes to Drillbit? Tell me that he will be alright? Or does your 
records just not mention him?"

She had other questions on her mind. "WHo sits on my council. Who 
will lead as my second in command? And what happens after the 
Allience is gone?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Gabriel saw this reaction and was quite taken back. "My lady I 
know that 
> this is a shock. But to save my world and the pred rule that I know 
to be 
> saved. You must destroy the alliance. Please you have been recorded 
as the 
> great ambassador who combined preds and destrons and maximals alike 
to take 
> down this evil foe."
